message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to invest in something that will benefit your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit steep for me. Would you consider a price closer to $10,000?
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11,500.
I appreciate you meeting me a bit, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,750 and call it a deal?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $10,750. I'm willing to make another concession and sell the product to you for $11,200.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable here.  $11,000 is my final offer. If you can't accept that, I'll have to explore other options.
I understand that you're trying to be reasonable, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $11,250.
